DOC.brief_summary: Serum bio-markers have different prediction values for ovarian response during ovarian stimulation in-vitro fertilization
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of the Accuracy and Reliability of AMH, FSH and AFC in Predicting Ovarian Response
DOC.criteria: Age â‰¤ 45 years at the time of FSH starting BMI < 25 kg/m2, First IVF attempt Receiving GnRHantagonist protocol Had oocyte retrieval Had ovarian stimulation or ovulation induction within 2 months prior to the study PCOS Had ovarian tumor or endometrioma Hyperprolactinemia Thyroid hormone disorders Pituitary failure Had other medical situations such as liver failure, renal failure, heart disease, diabetes, depression Had IVM
